reviews.review_msg: Honestly, worst teacher I've ever had!

She's very nice and her class was very easy if you did the work you would get a good mark. Although this is the class I have learned the least in. Nothing was taught and it was extremely boring. It's an easy A though you have to endure the boring class and come out with no skills. But she's nice and does care.

This professor is the worst professor at SFU. No, that is not hyperbole. Taking this course made me forever angry at that name. It has been many semesters now since I have taken this course and it still lives rent free in my head. The only recourse I have is in telling people to take this course with her, knowing others will suffer the same fate.

Phil 270 with Kino is a great course. The weekly readings can seem daunting, but you're only really expected to grasp a few key conceptsâ€”clearly outlined in the slides. *Please* just hit the books and ask questions when you're confused. Kino responds to emails quickly and is illuminating during office hours. Doing poorly in this class is a choice!
if you take this class after reading the other reviews, you deserve what's coming to you. don't complain. you did this to yourself.
This class is a disaster. Regret not dropping it earlier. Now stuck with Kino's sleep-inducing lectures
